name: Rags
overview: RAGS is intended to feel like a deluxe version of the last level of the C64 game Beach Head 2. The plot is simple: Two guys face each other in an arena trying to kill each other. This goal can be achieved by knifes, portable rocket launchers, mini-guns or by luring the opponent into a trap. The game can be played against a computer opponent, which was designed long before we had our first lecture in Artificial Intelligence, and is therefore not too smart, but the real fun starts when You play against a friend.
